plot: Take 14 self-confessed nerds - who've never touched a football in their lives - give them three months intensive training with professional coaches and see how they fare against a professional team in front of a huge crowd.
plot_en: Take 14 self-confessed nerds - who've never touched a football in their lives - give them three months intensive training with professional coaches and see how they fare against a professional team in front of a huge crowd.
plot_es: Take 14 self-confessed nerds - who've never touched a football in their lives - give them three months intensive training with professional coaches and see how they fare against a professional team in front of a huge crowd.
title: Nerds FC
